author: Staff Correspondent
text:
As many as seven people were injured during fireworks at a temple festival in Kolar Gold Fields (KGF) early on Saturday.

Two of the injured were admitted to R.L. Jalappa Hospital in Kolar and five others were rushed to Victoria Hospital in Bengaluru.

The incident occurred around 3 a.m. while devotees were engaged in bursting firecrackers as part of Hamsavahanotsav at the Sri Prasanna Venkataramanaswamy temple.
title: 7 injured during fireworks at temple fest
